last_completed_task: Created comprehensive debugging tools for TOS modal investigation. Built tos-modal-debug.js with 20+ console logs and tos-modal-test.html minimal test page. Identified 5 potential root causes.

context_notes: Switched from solution-first to diagnosis-first debugging approach after 2 failed fixes (file sync, CSP). Debug tools will track: script execution, style injection timing, DOM insertion, computed CSS properties. Test page provides clean environment without page CSS conflicts. Potential root causes: CSS timing race condition, z-index stacking context, specificity battle, script loading order, or silent style injection failure.
